bio:
Mithllon lives in Whiterun. He is an Altmer. He typically wears mage robes imbued with expert-level magicka-boosting enchantments. He runs a shop named the Soultrapped Horker in the Plains District of the city, close to the main marketplace area. He mostly sells magical spell tomes, along with a few magical scrolls.
When not working, Mithllon often patronizes the Bannered Mare, a nearby popular tavern which is run by a woman named Hulda.
name: Mithllon
